      Configures the number of milliseconds to wait between receiving batches of messages.
      SubscribeConfiguration.Builder SubscribeConfiguration.Builder.batchSize(int batchSize)
      Configures the number of messages received per request when subscribingInBatch.
      EventHubConfiguration EventHubConfiguration.Builder.build()
      Builds the complete configuration to create a new Event Hub client
      PublishConfiguration.Builder PublishConfiguration.Builder.cacheAckIntervalMillis(long cacheAckIntervalMillis)
      The cache interval dictates how long Event Hub will wait and collect acks before sending to the client Overriding this interval is useful in controlling how often acks are returned to the client
      SubscribeConfiguration.Builder SubscribeConfiguration.cloneConfig() 
      EventHubConfiguration.Builder EventHubConfiguration.cloneConfig() 
      SubscribeConfiguration.Builder SubscribeConfiguration.Builder.durationBeforeRetrySeconds(int durationBeforeRetry)
      The duration before retry is the length of time Event Hub will wait before resending a message to a subscriber.
      EventHubConfiguration.Builder EventHubConfiguration.Builder.fromEnvironmentVariables()
      When both Event Hub and UAA instances are bound to the application and the respective service instance names are defined in the environment variables EVENTHUB_INSTANCE_NAME and UAA_INSTANCE_NAME, this will automatically populate all the required Event Hub configuration fields to connect to Event Hub
      EventHubConfiguration.Builder EventHubConfiguration.Builder.fromEnvironmentVariables(String authURL)
      When the Event Hub instance is bound to the application, the environment variable EVENTHUB_INSTANCE_NAME is defined, and the authURL is provided, this method will populate all the required Event Hub configuration fields to connect to Event Hub.
      EventHubConfiguration.Builder EventHubConfiguration.Builder.fromEnvironmentVariables(String eventhubInstanceName, String uaaInstanceName)
      When both the Event Hub and UAA instances are bound to the application, this will automatically populate all the required Event Hub configuration fields based on the services names provided in the parameters
      EventHubConfiguration.Builder EventHubConfiguration.Builder.fromEnvironmentVariablesWithInstance(String eventhubInstanceName)
      When the Event Hub is bound to the application, this will automatically populate the fields relating to Event Hub but NOT fields relating to OAuth2
      SubscribeConfiguration.Builder SubscribeConfiguration.Builder.maxRetries(int maxRetries)
      max retries indicates the maximum amount of times Event Hub should resend a message to a subscriber.
      EventHubConfiguration.Builder EventHubConfiguration.Builder.reconnectRetryLimit(Integer reconnectRetryLimit)
      Configures number of retries for reconnecting to Event Hub Service
      PublishConfiguration.Builder PublishConfiguration.Builder.timeout(long timeout)
      Configures the max time the client will wait for acks from Event Hub
